item.title: Samantha add a quote by Brigid Kemmerer
item.description: "Nick,” he said. “I think I’m going to need you to bite my arm.” “I think I’m going to need you to run that by me again." -- Brigid Kemmerer

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Chelsea Fine
item.description: "Gabriel shuffled around the trunk again, searching for faux arrows—arrows designed to injure but not kill. “All these arrows are sharp—and have blood on them.” “Yes, well, I left my cotton candy arrows at home next to my teddy bear." -- Chelsea Fine

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Kendare Blake
item.description: "You fuck - you ate my cat!" -- Kendare Blake

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Put the jerk in the south wing, you won't see him for weeks at a time. Or lock him in the attic. The law will not be on your side, but literary precedent will." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "You pierce my soul. I am half agony, half hope...I have loved none but you." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Susan Ee
item.description: "I never kid about my warrior demigod status." "Oh. My. God." I lower my voice, having forgotten to whisper. "You are nothing but a bird with an attitude. Okay, so you have a few muscles, I’ll grant you that. But you know, a bird is nothing but a barely evolved lizard. That’s what you are." -- Susan Ee

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Susan Ee
Samantha add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Be prepared for the worst, my love, for it lives next door to the best." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Juliet Marillier
item.description: "You are... you're like a beating heart. A glowing lamp. I've never met anyone like you before." -- Juliet Marillier

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Juliet Marillier
item.description: "How could you not know?" His voice was full of wonderment. "You changed me utterly. You were like a...like a bright, wonderful bloom in a garden full of weeds. Like a graceful capital on a page of plain script, a letter decorated with the deepest, finest colors in all Erin. Like a flame, Caitrin. Like a song." -- Juliet Marillier

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Nicole Krauss
item.description: "Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering." -- Nicole Krauss
